meanings.definition: The quality or state of being bashful.
meanings.sent1: Her bashfulnesses made it hard for her to speak up in class.
meanings.sent2: His bashfulnesses often led him to avoid social gatherings.
meanings.sent3: Despite his bashfulnesses, he managed to give a heartfelt speech at the wedding.
meanings.sent4: The bashfulnesses of the kitten hiding behind the couch were endearing.
meanings.sent5: The bashfulnesses of the flower blooming in the shade added to its charm.

meanings.sent1: The bashfulnesses of the child at the party were evident as she clung to her mother's leg.
meanings.sent2: His bashfulnesses often made him blush when meeting new people.
meanings.sent3: The bashfulnesses of the puppy meeting the cat for the first time were comical.
meanings.sent4: Her bashfulnesses were like a delicate veil, hiding her true feelings.
meanings.sent5: The bashfulnesses of the deer in the clearing added to its innocent charm.

meanings.definition: A feeling of embarrassment or self-consciousness.

meanings.sent2: The bashfulnesses she felt during the presentation made her cheeks turn pink.
